name: Car Rally Racing Fun
description:
Car Rally Racing Fun is one of best car games. Are you a big fan of mega ramp car? Car ramps or car stunts 3D if you're a ramp enthusiast this game is for you , do you like fast cars . There is a huge amount of ramps they are crazy impossible ! Drive carefully , making ramps circuit race and race tracks in there waiting for for you to drive ahead the speeding car take the pilot seat and lets burn the hot wheels in jumping over the ramps and tracks , but beware of taking damage the ramp car is can be unlocked when you reach certain level There is plenty of car ramps and racing tracks so you can Enjoy our car games race game. Jump, perform fantastic acrobatics and car stunts, feel the speed in your skin and crazy stunt.
Features:
- Authentic vehicle physics and flawless drive Vehicles controls
- Detailed 3D graphics with amazing sounds and animations
- Various simulation for offroad enthusiasts.
- Engaging Modern Challenges with tricky tracks, mega ramps, and obstacles
- Realistic acceleration and speed controls
- Extremely Precise Driving Simulator
